Ever since .18 (was it .18?), when the scientific equipment came out, I spent about five or six days trying to figure out what they did but I later found out, to my dismay, that they did diddly squat. So I was thinking, you could actually use scientific equipment for the UI stuff, like the accelerometer could be used to figure out the g-force and the speed and the thermometer could be used to detect if an engine or SRB is overheating. The Gravioli detector could be used to figure out the altitude, the antennae could be used to get better reception of probe GUIs, such as the more antennas you have, the less the GUI glitches out and the barometer we treat like Vall, all these scientific equipment are yours, except the Barometer, attempt no usage of it on your craft.

Edited August 24, 2013 by NASI Director
